nodes.bodyText: I assume this file is the source for the article figure.  If that's true, it shouldn't be part of the source code.

nodes.bodyText: This property, and the following related to serenity seems to be particular of your environment. If so please remove them.
In this case, all I did was to fix the identation, which was using tabs, to the recommended number of spaces. All other properties were already there - except, of course, the ArchUnit's

There are some issues with Fluent API formatting. The formatted recommended in the Author's documentation should help. Sometimes even after using the formatter, may still be some issues you have to tweak manually.
